articles.title: Greetings to President of Germany
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Germany
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Friday sent a message of greeting to Joachim Gauck, president of the Federal Republic of Germany, on the occasion of its national day.
					 The message expressed belief that the relations between the two countries would grow strong in various fields on the principle of respect for sovereignty, equality and mutual benefit.

articles.title: DPRK FM Meets Presidential Envoy of Far Eastern Region of Russia
articles.content:
DPRK FM Meets Presidential Envoy of Far Eastern Region of Russia
 Moscow, October 2 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong on a visit to Russia met and had a friendly talk with Yuri Trutnev, deputy prime minister and presidential envoy of the Far Eastern Region of the Russian Federation on Thursday.
					 Both sides exchanged views on the issues of boosting economic cooperation between the two countries.
					
					 That day Ri Su Yong met with Nikolai Fyodorov, minister of Agriculture of Russia, and discussed the issues of developing bilateral cooperation in the agricultural field.
					
					 A MOU on cooperation between the ministries of agriculture of the two countries was signed.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Syrian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Syrian President
						
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, Thursday received a message of greeting from Bashar Al-Assad, president of the Syrian Arab Republic.
					 The message said:
					
					 Allow me to send my heartfelt warm congratulations to Your Excellency on my own behalf and on behalf of the leadership of Syria's Baath Arab Socialist Party on the occasion of October 10, the 69th anniversary of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 Please accept Your Excellency my best wishes for your good health and happiness and the friendly Korean people's  greater progress and prosperity under the wise guidance of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 On this significant occasion of the anniversary of the founding of the WPK, I express belief that friendly relations between our two countries will grow stronger in the interests of the two friendly peoples.
					
					 Please accept my highest regards.

articles.title: Delegation of Lenin Young Communist League of Russia Leaves
articles.content:
Delegation of Lenin Young Communist League of Russia Leaves
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Lenin Young Communist League of the Russian Federation led by Anatoli Dolgachev, first secretary of the Central Committee of the league, left here for home on Friday.

articles.title: Appeal to All Koreans
articles.content:
Appeal to All Koreans
						
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- All-Korean Committee for Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration Friday sent an appeal to all Koreans in the north, the south and abroad on the occasion of the 7th anniversary of the historic October 4 declaration.
					 The committee in an appeal stressed the need to open a new phase of peace, co-prosperity and reunification under the unfurled banner of the north-south joint declarations.
					
					 The appeal called upon all Koreans to dynamically turn out in the drive to firmly defend the north-south joint declarations and implement them by their concerted efforts.
					
					 It called upon them to thoroughly reject all sorts of such mud-slinging as denying the other party and fostering confrontation between fellow countrymen.
					
					 It called for opposing and rejecting outsiders' interference and dependence on them in the issue of national reunification and settling the reunification issue independently by the concerted efforts of the Koreans as proposed by the north-south joint declarations.
					
					 It underscored the need to make the committee a nationwide organization for the reunification movement which steers the movement of people from all walks life in the north, the south and abroad.
					
					 It underlined the need to further boost the unity and solidarity of all Koreans in the north, the south and abroad and kindle the torch for implementing the north-south joint declarations in all places where Koreans live and thus usher in the second June 15 era of reunification.
					
					 2015 is a significant year marking the 70th anniversary of national liberation and the 15th anniversary of the historic June 15 joint declaration, it said, and went on:
					
					 Let's make 2015 a year of historic turn to usher in a new heyday of the movement for national reunification in the same high spirit as was displayed when the August 15 liberation was achieved and with the same hot wind with which the June 15 era was ushered in!
					
					 In order to make 2015 a year of great turn shining in the history for the reunification movement, All-Korean Committee for Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration will form a joint preparatory body, pool all wisdom and energies and exert all efforts to let all fellow countrymen positively join in the drive.
					
					 The appeal stressed the need to greet the 15th anniversary of the historic June 15 joint declaration and the 70th anniversary of the significant August 15 national liberation as grand festivals for national reunification to be specially recorded in the national history.

articles.title: 2014 Event for Celebrating Foundation Day of Korea Heldã€€
articles.content:
2014 Event for Celebrating Foundation Day of Korea Held
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- A 2014 event for celebrating the Foundation Day of Korea took place in front of the Mausoleum of King Tangun on Friday on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of its reconstruction.
					 Present there were Chairman of the National Reconciliation Council Kim Yong Dae who is chairman of the Central Committee of the Korean Social Democratic Party, Chairman of the North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration Kim Wan Su who is director of the Secretariat of the Presidium of the Central Committee of the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea, Chairman of the North Headquarters of the Pan-National Alliance for Korean's Reunification Choe Jin Su who is chairman of the Central Committee of the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea, officials of political parties and social and religious organizations and people from all walks of life.
					
					 It was attended by a delegation of the south side led by Kim Sam Yol, permanent chairman of the south side preparatory committee for the joint event for celebrating the Foundation Day of Korea, and overseas compatriots staying in the homeland.
					
					 After a ritual they performed an ancestral sacrifice for Tangun.
					
					 Kim Yong Dae and Kim In Hwan, chairman for Religious Affairs of the Central Headquarters of Chondoism of south Korea, made congratulatory speeches.
					
					 They expressed belief that when all the Koreans at home and abroad get united close under the banner of patriotism based on the commonness as a homogeneous nation and turn out as one to implement the joint declarations, the barrier of distrust and confrontation would be pulled down and the country's reunification be surely achieved.
					
					  Delegates of the north and the south made addresses.
					
					 Yun Jong Ho, vice-chairman of the Council for the Reunification of Tangun's Nation, said that the immortal feats President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il performed by making sure that the history of Tangun's nation would last forever on this land remain shining more brilliantly thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He noted that next year is the significant year marking the 15th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration and the 70th anniversary of the country's liberation and 2015 should be greeted with splendor as the year of the June 15 era of independent reunification and the year of grand festival for reunification. 
					
					 Kim Sam Yol said that the joint event for celebrating the Foundation Day of Korea clearly proves that when all Koreans pool their will and efforts they can surely achieve the peaceful reunification of the country though they face difficulties and trials.
					
					 He stressed the need to devote all efforts and wisdom for reunifying the country by uniting as one in the spirit of By Our Nation Itself.
					
					 An appeal to the compatriots at home and abroad was read out at the joint event.
					
					 The appeal called for preserving and glorifying the excellent tradition and history of the Korean nation and appealed to the Koreans to get united close and thoroughly implement the north-south joint declarations under the banner of patriotism and usher in a new era of independent reunification and national prosperity.
					
					 There took place a brass band performance and art performance by DPRK artistes and Taekwon-Do demonstration.

articles.title: Russian Government Provides Food Aid to DPRKã€€
articles.content:
Russian Government Provides Food Aid to DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- The ship with the first batch of 50 000 tons of free food aid provided by the government of the Russian Federation to the DPRK arrived in Nampho Port on Friday.
					 The sincere aid from the Russian government and people proves the development of the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between Russia and the DPRK and encourages the Korean people in their struggle to build a thriving nation.

articles.title: DPRK Players Come First at Table Tennis Mixed Doubles of Asian Games
articles.content:
DPRK Players Come First at Table Tennis Mixed Doubles of Asian Games
						
 Inchon, October 3 (KCNA Correspondent) -- DPRK players Kim Hyok Bong and Kim Jong grabbed gold medals at the table tennis mixed doubles of the 17th Asian Games.
					 They beat their south Korean rivals 3:1 in the 16 knockout match, their Chinese rivals 3:2 in the quarter-finals and their Japanese rivals 4:1 in the semi-finals to advance into the finals.
					
					 They played a hot match with their rivals of Hong Kong of China Friday. They humbled their rivals 4:1.
					
					 Meanwhile, DPRK players Kim Jong and Kim Hye Song came third at the table tennis women's doubles and Kim Un Hyang placed third at the women's 10m platform diving event.

articles.title: DPRK Player Grabs Gold Medal at Parachuting Championshipã€€
articles.content:
DPRK Player Grabs Gold Medal at Parachuting Championship
						
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- DPRK player Kim Hyong Jun came first at the 16th Asia and Oceania Parachuting Championship and the 2014 Indonesia International Open Tournament held in Bandung, Indonesia from Sept. 5 to 14. They brought together more than 250 men and women players from at least 20 countries and regions including the DPRK.
					 Kim Hyong Jun placed first at the men's individual accuracy landing, grabbing a gold medal.
					
					 DPRK women players came second at the women's team accuracy landing.
					
					 DPRK players returned home on Friday.

articles.title: Stamp Issued in DPRK to Mark Int'l Day of Older Persons
articles.content:
Stamp Issued in DPRK to Mark Int'l Day of Older Persons
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- A stamp was issued in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea to mark the International Day of Older Persons (October 1).
					 Printed on the circular stamp are letters "International Day of Older Persons", "October 1" and "For the Elderly".
					
					 The stamp features against the background of world map an emblem of the Central Committee of the Korea Federation for Care of the Aged, which was founded in April, Juche 92 (2003).

articles.title: New Kind of Pulley Manufactured in DPRK
articles.content:
New Kind of Pulley Manufactured in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- The Junggu Public Building Construction Company in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea developed a new kind of pulley to be used for such works as plastering and tile-setting.
					 This pulley, made with 3mm-thick sheet iron, is 220mm in diameter and weighs 3.5 kg, with lifting capacity of 2 to 3 tons.
					
					 It can be easily manufactured at any unit with very low cost, and it is handy to use.
					
					 Awarded with invention certificate, the new type of pulley has been applied to many construction sites.

articles.title: Tangun, Ancestral Father of Korean Nation
articles.content:
Tangun, Ancestral Father of Korean Nation
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- Tangun is the ancestral father of the Korean nation who built Ancient Korea (early 30th century B.C.-108 B.C.), the first country in the East, with Pyongyang as its capital.
					 He was once known to be a mythical person, but was ascertained to be a real being at last, thanks to the energetic guidance of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 In order to set right the history of Tangun and Ancient Korea, distorted by the Japanese imperialists during their colonial rule over Korea, President Kim Il Sung saw to it that King Tangun's mausoleum was discovered. And he had guided the reconstruction of the mausoleum, personally examining its miniature, until the last moments of his life.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il took a series of state measures for the discovery and confirmation and ensured that the mausoleum was reconstructed splendidly as befitting one of the ancestral father of the nation.
					
					 Inspired by their deep attention, historians in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea succeeded on October 2, Juche 82 (1993) in unearthing the mausoleum and remains of Tangun at the foot of Mt. Taebak located northwest of the Kangdong County Town, Pyongyang, and proving in a scientific way that Tangun was the real father of the Korean nation.
					
					 The mausoleum was reconstructed in less than one year after the ground breaking on a site covering 45 hectares and its unveiling ceremony held on October 11, 1994.
					
					 A 2014 event for celebrating the Foundation Day of Korea took place in front of the Mausoleum of King Tangun on Friday.
					
					 At the event, Ri Tong Je, chairman of the Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification, told KCNA that the Mausoleum of King Tangun is the sacred place of the Korean nation and Pyongyang is the Holy City of Korea.

articles.title: History: Koguryo Kingdom and Its Successor Palhaeã€€
articles.content:
History: Koguryo Kingdom and Its Successor Palhae
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- Koguryo Kingdom (B.C. 227-A.D. 668), founded by King Tongmyong as the first feudal state in Ancient Korea, was known to be a powerful military power in the East.
					 It encouraged its inhabitants to master such martial arts as horse-riding, archery and swordsmanship and gave priority to the military qualification in appointing functionaries.
					
					 The kingdom also boasted of developed economy, including agriculture, handicraft and stockbreeding, and culture. In particular, its medicine, metal processing and ceramic skills were worthy to be proud of.
					
					 Lots of Koguryo tomb mural paintings were listed as world cultural heritages.
					
					 After the fall of Koguryo, Palhae emerged as its successor. Its birth was declared by Tea Jo Yong in Tongmosan (China's Dunhua at present) in 698 after his father, a commander of Koguryo, founded Jinguk in 684 when he continued the struggle to drive out the foreign occupationists.
					
					 Palhae (698-926) came to fame as a thriving country in the East that inherited Koguryo Kingdom in every aspect. It made a rapid progress in political, economic, military and cultural aspects.
					
					 The dynasty exercised an independent sovereignty in its interests while directing big efforts to the strengthening of defence capabilities with several hundred thousand troops maintained. The people of Palhae were possessed of superb martial art.
					
					 After retaking the old territory of Koguryo, Palhae developed trade with other countries. Its ceramics and fur products were regarded as treasures in those countries.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Marked
						
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Friday dedicates an article to the anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Organizes and Guides All the Victories of Our People"
					 The work, published on October 3, Juche 79 (1990), comprehensively clarifies the idea that the leadership of the party provides a sure guarantee for the victory of the cause of socialism and the theoretical and practical issues arising in party building and activities, including the matter of developing the WPK into a revolutionary party of Juche type and the basic ways to discharge the mission and duty of the party as a leading political organization.
					
					 The high prestige, invincible might and the feats performed by the WPK in the revolution and construction would be unthinkable without the leadership of Kim Jong Il, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The WPK is demonstrating its dignity and might as the party of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il as it is led by Marshal Kim Jong Un in the new century of Juche.
					
					 The party's guiding idea is formulated as Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and the struggle for modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism is making dynamic progress thanks to the leadership of Kim Jong Un, who remains intensely loyal to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The party's unity and cohesion have become unbreakable and its fighting capability has remarkably increased under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He has led the party to be a powerful party which formed a harmonious whole with the masses. His leadership is oriented to thoroughly embodying Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's idea of believing in the people as in Heaven in party building and activities.
					
					 "Everything for the people and solve everything by relying on them!" This is the militant slogan put up by the party at present.
					
					 Invincible is the cause of the WPK which steers the new era of the Juche revolution along the road of victory under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blasts Park Geun Hye's Confrontational Remarks
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blasts Park Geun Hye's Confrontational Remarks
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, Park Geun Hye again talked such rubbish as "responsible member of the international community" and "participation in the efforts made by south Korea" while crying out for the DPRK's "dismantlement of its nuclear program." She also tried to create impression that the mission of the south Korean army is to "make someone's life affluent and build a foundation for peaceful unification" while pulling up the north over its "human rights" issue. 
					 Commenting on her reckless remarks, Rodong Sinmun Friday says what Park uttered inciting confrontation wherever she went, swishing her skirt despite the stern warnings of the DPRK, indicates that she has lost her senses as she stakes her fate on the confrontation with the fellow countrymen.
					
					 If she has an elementary insight, she should understand that the DPRK will never give up its nuclear program unless the U.S. rolls backs its hostile policy toward the DPRK and stops posing nuclear threats, and that the DPRK considers her oft-repeated cry for the north's "dismantlement of its nuclear program" as no more than a dog's barking.
					
					 The DPRK's nuclear deterrence is not a bargaining chip for holding negotiations or getting something.
					
					 The puppet forces do not have any justification and face to talk about "the north's dismantlement of its nuclear program" as they have frequently introduced U.S. nuclear forces into south Korea and stepped up the preparations for a war of aggression, squandering a colossal amount of money collected from people as taxes every year.
					
					 "Human rights" issue oft-repeated by her is groundless sophism that can be let loose only by one steeped in bitterness toward the DPRK to the marrow of one's bones.

articles.title: Minju Joson Blasts Park Geun Hye's Confrontational Remarks
articles.content:
Minju Joson Blasts Park Geun Hye's Confrontational Remarks
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- Park Geun Hye at a "state council meeting" on September 30 blustered that the "north's nuclear issue and human rights issue" are "core points in the policy toward the north" and "there should be no passive approach towards these issues for fear of the north's backlash". 
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Friday says this brings to light the ugly nature of Park who has inveterate repugnance and bitterness toward the fellow countrymen in the north.
					
					 What merits grave attention is that Park singled out the "north's nuclear issue and human rights issue" as the "core points of the policy toward the north".
					
					 The puppet forces' "policy toward the north" is not aimed to achieve the national reconciliation and unity, improve the north-south relations and attain independent unification at all. It is designed to stifle the fellow countrymen in collusion with outsiders and achieve "unification under liberal democracy". "Confidence-building process" and "Dresden initiative" touted by Park are also aimed to attain her sinister goal.
					
					 By defining the "north's nuclear issue and human rights issue" as "core points of south Korea's policy toward the north" Park openly disclosed her ulterior motive to escalate confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north.
					
					 What she uttered at the "state council meeting" is just a repetition of her speech at the UN General Assembly.
					
					 No matter how desperately Park may work, the DPRK will build a thriving nation envied by the world people by more firmly holding the just treasured sword--nuclear deterrence.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Opposes "Government's" Unilateral Moves to Open Rice Market
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Opposes "Government's" Unilateral Moves to Open Rice Market
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- The Kangwon Provincial Federation of the Federation of Peasants Associations of south Korea held an urgent press conference to defend the food sovereignty outside the South Korean Kangwon Provincial Office on Sept. 30, according to the south Korean KBS.
					 The organization blamed the regime for mulling unilaterally and totally opening the rice market despite the opposition of farmers.

articles.title: S. Korean Ruling and Opposition Parties' Agreement on Institution of Special Law Lambasted
articles.content:
S. Korean Ruling and Opposition Parties' Agreement on Institution of Special Law Lambasted
						
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- The south Korean paper Hangyore on Sept. 30 carried an editorial.
					 That day the ruling and opposition parties agreed on the issue of instituting a special law on the ferry Sewol but it was made without consent of the bereaved families, the editorial said.
					
					 There are not a few parts arousing concern in the contents of agreement, it noted, adding one of them is that the ruling and opposition parties agreed to deal with the special law on the ferry Sewol after the provision of draft agreement on other laws including "law on organizing the government".
					
					 This is because the "Saenuri Party" demanded a special bill be dealt in relation with other bills, it charged.
					
					 It stressed that the ruling and opposition parties should reflect on their incompetence.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Should Be De-Listed as Korean: General Association of Koreans in China
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Should Be De-Listed as Korean: General Association of Koreans in China 
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China issued a statement in denunciation of Park Geun Hye, an anti-reunification confrontational maniac, on Sept. 27.
					 The statement accused Park of letting loose a spate of ridiculous vituperation malignantly slandering the DPRK in her "keynote speech" at the 69th UN General Assembly.
					
					 The DPRK's nukes are the most just physical deterrence to cope with the U.S. aggressive acts of brandishing nuclear weapons and the gains of a sovereign state which allow no one to bargain, the statement noted, adding:
					
					 It is foolish, impudent and provocative, indeed, for the puppet chief executive, a stooge of the U.S., to take the floor at the UN.
					
					 Park should be de-listed as a Korean as early as possible.
					
					 South Korea is the worst tundra of human rights in the world.
					
					  As recognized by the whole world, the DPRK is the only country where its people are free from taxes and enjoy free healthcare and free education and where the state fully guarantees political rights and freedom of the popular masses and takes care of their life under the socialist system.
					
					 Park, a colonial stooge of the U.S., frantically kicks up a racket, taking issue with the inviolable human rights of the DPRK. This is an intolerable insult to the DPRK.
					
					 Park would be well advised to behave herself, bearing in mind that those who hurt the dignity and social system of the DPRK cannot escape from a merciless punishment.
					
					 The General Association of Koreans in China and Koreans in China together with the people in the homeland will never pardon Park's anti-DPRK human rights campaign and confrontational moves.

articles.title: Seminar Held by Koreans in China
articles.content:
Seminar Held by Koreans in China
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China held a seminar in Shenyang, China on Sept. 30 on the occasions of the 34th anniversary of the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo (DFRK) and the 7th anniversary of the October 4 declaration.
					 Present there were Choe Un Bok, chairwoman of the association, representatives of the Federation of Korean National Economic Workers in China, the Liaoning Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China and the Liaoning Regional Association of Federation of Korean Young Nationals in China and other Koreans in China.
					
					 Choe Un Bok read out the proposal for founding the DFRK and the "Declaration for Development of North-South Relations and Peace and Prosperity".
					
					 Vice-Chairman Choe Su Bong spoke at the seminar. 
					
					 He said the October 4 declaration which the north and the south agreed upon and solemnly declared at home and abroad thanks to the unshakable will of leader Kim Jong Il for reunification is the reunification programme common to the nation which reflects the will of all Koreans for the independent development of the nation and the peaceful reunification of the country as the programme for implementing the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 The validity and vitality of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration have already been proved in practice, he said, calling upon all Koreans aspiring after the reunification of the country to support the programmes for reunification and struggle to carry out them.
					
					 Then followed speeches by others.
					
					  The speakers called upon all Koreans in China to turn out as one in the struggle to achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country under the unfurled banner of By Our Nation Itself under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, true to the proposal for national reunification and the reunification programmes common to the nation provided by President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: WPK Enjoys Absolute Support and Trust from People: Tajik Politician
articles.content:
WPK Enjoys Absolute Support and Trust from People: Tajik Politician 
						
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- Sh. Shabdolov, chairman of the Communist Party of Tajikistan, made public a statement on Sept. 26 on the occasion of the 69th anniversary of the foundation of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The WPK is enjoying the absolute support and trust from the people, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The WPK has laid down the lines and policies fully reflecting the working people's opinions, wishes and interests and thoroughly implemented them.
					
					 The Korean people achieved a shining victory in the Fatherland Liberation War to beat back the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces' aggression under the wise leadership of the WPK headed by President Kim Il Sung. They also wound up the post-war rehabilitation and construction in a brief span of time and carried out industrialization, thus turning the DPRK into a powerful socialist industrial state.
					
					 They keenly realize the validity of the lines and policies of the WPK through their life experience.
					
					 The Korean people, therefore, have absolute trust in the WPK and they are unconditionally carrying out its lines and policies.
					
					 They are now all out to implement the WPK's policies, united close around Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK.
					
					 We sincerely wish them greater successes in the struggle to defend socialism.

articles.title: Nigerian Organization Introduces Glorious History of WPK
articles.content:
Nigerian Organization Introduces Glorious History of WPK
						
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted articles on its website on Sept. 26 to mark the 69th anniversary of the foundation of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 An article titled "Guiding the people for nearly 70 years" noted the WPK has always led the Korean people along the road of victory despite all sorts of ordeals and trials of history since its foundation.
					
					 The WPK, which proclaimed its foundation on Oct. 10, 1945, aroused all Korean people to the construction of a new country and in this course the Democratic People's Republic of Korea was founded, the article said, and went on:
					
					 The WPK directed primary efforts to building and developing the army after the liberation of Korea. It defended the freedom and independence of the country in the fierce three-year war provoked by the U.S. imperialists and wisely led the post-war rehabilitation and construction and socialist construction.
					
					 In those days when the imperialists waged a vicious anti-socialist offensive, trumpeting about the "total end of socialism", the WPK led to a shining victory the battle to safeguard socialism under the unfurled banner of Songun, thus bringing about a turning phase for the building of a thriving nation.
					
					 After turning the DPRK into a political, ideological and military power, the WPK is now focusing its efforts on building an economic power and improving the people's living standard while putting spurs to building a highly civilized socialist country.
					
					 Another article titled "Flag bearing the responsibility for the destiny of people" said the WPK creditably performed its mission and role as a mother party which served the people and took care of their destiny in a responsible manner under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: DPRK's Anniversaries Observed by Guinean Organization
articles.content:
DPRK's Anniversaries Observed by Guinean Organization
						
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- The Guinean National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a bulletin on Sept. 26 on the occasion of the 17th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), the 69th founding anniversary of the WPK and the 88th anniversary of the Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU).
					 The bulletin in an article titled "October and Workers' Party of Korea" said that Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the WPK was a significant event in developing the party.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il developed the WPK into the party of President Kim Il Sung which carries forward the idea and cause of the President after his demise and defended socialism with Songun politics and ushered in a new heyday of building a thriving nation.
					
					 The founding of the WPK on Oct. 10, 1945 by the President helped establish the socialist system centered on the popular masses in the people's country, the first of its kind in the history of the Korean nation spanning five thousand years.
					
					 Oct. 17 marks the 88th anniversary of the DIU.
					
					 Thanks to the formation of the DIU the Korean revolution made a new start and the Korean people came to be guided by a correct programme of struggle and strategy and tactics. 
					
					 October is the very meaningful month which is crowded with significant holidays of the WPK and which comprehensively deals with its protracted and glorious history.
					
					 In an article titled "Kim Jong Il, 17th anniversary of his election as general secretary of the WPK" the bulletin noted that he unrolled a plan for building a thriving nation and formulated Songun politics as the basic political mode under socialism.
					
					 The bulletin in an article titled "Leading the people for nearly 70 years" referred to the glorious history of the WPK.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Accused of Her Anti-Reunification Behavior
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Accused of Her Anti-Reunification Behavior
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Korean Friendship Association UK made public a joint statement on Sept. 27 assailing Park Geun Hye of south Korea for her anti-reunification confrontation behavior.
					 Park, daughter of the former "yusin" dictator of south Korea, hurt the dignity and socialist system in the DPRK at the UN arena recently, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 Park in her speech cried out for building "peace park" in the area along the Military Demarcation Line of the Korean Peninsula. This is no more than a daydream as the U.S. imperialist aggression troops are present in south Korea, the U.S. nukes are leveling at the north and joint military exercises are staged against the DPRK every year.
					
					 Park is mulling indefinitely extending the transfer of wartime operation control to south Korea from the U.S. forces, begging for their permanent presence in south Korea.
					
					 She is talking about "human rights issue" in the DPRK where all its people are guaranteed the right to work and learn but it is none other than south Korea where human rights are most wantonly violated.
					
					 Park's ambition for achieving "unification through absorption" is quite contrary to all agreements and declarations between the north and the south.
					
					 The statement fully supported the principled stand of the DPRK, convinced that Park and her ambition for achieving "unification through absorption" would be thrown into the dumping ground of history by the struggle of the Korean people.

articles.title: Vietnamese Internet News on DPRK Players' Longing for Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Vietnamese Internet News on DPRK Players' Longing for Kim Jong Un
 Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- An article on DPRK players' longing for Marshal Kim Jong Un was posted on the Vietnamese internet news VN Express on Sept. 30.
					 The DPRK players taking part in the 17th Asian Games held a meeting "Night longing for respected Marshal Kim Jong Un", the article said, and went on:
					
					 At the meeting they recited a poem and sang songs revering Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The DPRK minister of Physical Culture and Sports said they spent not many days away from Kim Jong Un, but their minds were running to him, awake or asleep.
					
					 DPRK players have proved successful in the games, setting new world records in weightlifting events.
					
					 They are fully displaying their loyalty to their leader in the games.
					
					 Each time they were receiving medals, they extended deep thanks to Kim Jong Un who brought them up.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje de felicitacion a Joachim Gauck
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje de felicitacion a Joachim Gauck
Pyongyang, 3 de octubre (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 3 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica Federal de Alemania, Joachim Gauck, en ocasion del dia nacional de ese pais europeo.
					El remitente expreso la conviccion de que las relaciones entre los dos paises se profundizaran y se desarrollaran en varios dominios en el principio de respeto a la soberania, la igualdad y el beneficio mutuo.

articles.title: Canciller de RPDC se reune con vicepremier del gobierno ruso
articles.content:
Canciller de RPDC se reune con vicepremier del gobierno ruso
Moscu, 2 de octubre (ACNC) -- El canciller de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Ri Su Yong, de visita en Rusia, departio el dia 2 con el vicepremier del gobierno ruso y representante plenipotenciario del presidente de la Federacion Rusa acreditado en el distrito federal del Lejano Oriente, Yuri Trutnev.
					Ambas partes intercambiaron las opiniones sobre los asuntos para ampliar y desarrollar la cooperacion economica entre los dos paises.
					
					El mismo dia, Ri discutio con el ministro de Agricultura de Rusia, Nikolai Fyodorov, los temas de desarrollar en la rama agricola la cooperacion bilateral.
					
					Quedo rubricada una nota de entendimiento sobre la cooperacion entre los ministerios de agricultura de Corea y Rusia.

articles.title: Comite Conjunto Nacional del 15 de Junio emite llamamiento
articles.content:
Comite Conjunto Nacional del 15 de Junio emite llamamiento 
Pyongyang, 3 de octubre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 7o aniversario de la publicacion de la historica Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, el Comite Conjunto Nacional para la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio hizo publico el dia 3 un llamamiento a todos los coreanos del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar.
					El documento subraya la necesidad de abrir una nueva fase de la paz, la prosperidad conjunta y la reunificacion enarbolando la bandera de la Declaracion Conjunta del Norte y el Sur.
					
					Senala que toda la nacion debe defender y ejecutar las declaraciones conjuntas aprobadas entre ambas partes coreanas con las fuerzas unidas.
					
					Exhorta a rechazar estrictamente todos los actos de calumnia que niegan a su contraparte e instigan la confrontacion fratricida.
					
					Apunta que debe rechazar toda la intervencion de las fuerzas foraneas en los asuntos de reunificacion del pais y la dependencia en ellas y resolverlo con las fuerzas unidas de los connacionales como ya presentaron las declaraciones arriba mencionadas.
					
					Llama a convertir el Comite Conjunto Nacional para la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio en la pannacional organizacion del movimiento por la reunificacion que guia el movimiento de distintos estratos del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar por la reintegracion territorial.
					
					Destaca que hay que fortalecer mas la unidad y la solidaridad de todos los coreanos del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar, avivar furiosamente las llamaradas de la ejecucion de las declaraciones conjuntas intercoreanas en todos los lugares donde vive toda la nacion y abrir la segunda epoca del 15 de junio por la reunificacion.
					
					Se refiere a que 2015 es el ano significativo para acoger el 70o aniversario de la liberacion de la patria y el 15o aniversario de la publicacion de la historica Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio.
					
					Exhorta a hacer de 2015 el ano del cambio historico que abra la nueva era dorada del movimiento por la reunificacion de la patria con el impetu  de liberacion del 15 de agosto y con el fervor de la epoca del 15 de Junio.
					
					Subraya que los Comites Norteno, Sureno y Ultramarino para la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio deben establecer el aparato preparatorio conjunto para hacer de 2015 el ano de gran cambio que brillara en la historia del movimiento por la reunificacion, juntar todas las sabidurias y fuerzas y esforzarse con energia por que todos los coreanos se incorporen a ello.
					
					Concluye que hay que celebrar solemnemente el 15o aniversario de la publicacion de la historica Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y el 70o aniversario de liberacion de la patria del 15 de agosto como gran festival de la reunificacion de la patria que se registrara especialmente en la historia de la nacion.

articles.title: Gobierno ruso dona alimentos a RPDC
articles.content:
Gobierno ruso dona alimentos a RPDC
Pyongyang, 3 de octubre (ACNC) -- Llego el dia 3 al Puerto de Nampho el primer barco cargado de una parte de 50 mil toneladas de alimentos que el gobierno de la Federacion Rusa dona gratis a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					 La donacion sincera del gobierno y pueblo de Rusia deviene una manifestacion del desarrollo de las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion Corea-Rusia y sirve de estimulo a la lucha del pueblo coreano por construir un Estado prospero.

articles.title: Emitido sello por Dia Internacional de Ancianos
articles.content:
Emitido sello por Dia Internacional de Ancianos 
Pyongyang, 3 de octubre (ACNC) -- En la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea se dio a luz un sello individual con motivo del Dia Internacional de Ancianos (1 de octubre).
					En el sello circular se leen las letras "Dia Internacional de Ancianos", "Primero de Octubre" y "Para ancianos".
					
					Esta dibujada la insignia del Comite Central de la Federacion de Proteccion de los Ancianos de Corea con el mapamundi en el fondo.
					
					La entidad arriba mencionada fundada en abril del 92 (2003) de la Era Juche tiene la mision de asegurar los derechos e interes de los ancianos y hacer vivir a ellos digna y felizmente con buena salud en lo espiritual y fisico.
